entry.description: Creation of a context link for a Constraint
entry.label: ContextLink

constraint.name: Interaction fragment ordering
constraint.description: The fragment property of an Interaction must be ordered as a valid trace.
constraint.message: There is no valid trace sequencing the InteractionFragments in the fragment property. Some of them can not be organized as a valid sequence :{0}

constraint.name: InteractionOperand fragment ordering
constraint.description: The fragment property of an InteractionOperand must be ordered as a valid trace.
constraint.message: There is no valid trace sequencing the InteractionFragments in the fragment property. Some of them can not be organized as a valid sequence :{0}

constraint.name: Fragment ordering
constraint.description: The fragment property of an Interaction or InteractionOperand must be ordered as a valid trace.
constraint.message: There is no valid trace sequencing the InteractionFragments in the fragment property. Some of them can not be organized as a valid sequence :{0}

entry.description: Create a Duration Observation on a Message
entry.label: Duration Observation
